name: Corrupted Planet
description:
Corrupted Planet - Strategy Survival Game

A real-time strategy game about a biological lifeform trying to survive while an alien lifeform is trying to consume the planet.

This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam #36.

Development team:
Cryszon and OneginIII

NOTE - If the terrain doesn't render correctly (only water is shown), disable "HD Terrain" in the settings.
